relation: The Quick Email Verification API can be accessed with an API Key. This service provides e-mail address syntax checking, domain checking, role address detection, and disposable e-mail address...
The Kickbox API is an email verification service. With this service, developers can integrate email address verification into their own applications.

The Sift REST API allows developers to access and integrate the functionality of Sift with other applications. Some example API methods include identifying the type of email it is, retrieving a list...

The Front REST API allows developers to access and integrate the functionality of Front with other applications. Some example API methods include managing teams and teammates, listing and retrieving...
The Autopilot API allows developers to integrate their applications with the Autopilot marketing automation platform. The API provides methods for capturing leads, adding contacts, triggering...
